items.text: angles into the pads, and Imam tucks it away to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.preText: Mehidy. Round the wicket to Imam.
items.text: nice flight, goes with the angle towards middle stump. Clipped away through square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, 2 runs

items.text: down the track, not quite to the pitch of this slider coming in towards the stumps. Shows the full face to pick up another single to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, goes deep in his crease to work this with the turn to deep backward square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asif Ali, 1 run

items.text: flat slider that cramps Imam for room slightly. Makes up by going deep in his crease, and punches to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: not quite short enough to cut, this, and it goes on straight to beat the outside edge
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asif Ali, no run

items.text: goes back to a flat length ball on off stump, punches it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asif Ali, no run

items.preText:
shery: "By looking at wagon wheel of Asif Ali. He has scored all around the ground. He is getting matured with every match he pays" -- Looking at the shots he's played today, I think it's a bit of a disservice to him to think of him as simply a big hitter.

Here's Rubel. He's got six overs left to bowl. Over the wicket to Imam.
items.text: back of a length, slanting across to off stump. Looks to work it against the angle and gets a leading edge back down the pitch
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: dug in short, slanting away from off stump, and Imam miscues his pull. Had to drag it from fairly wide, and it popped up briefly in the air, but midwicket was on the boundary and it was safely to the left of mid-on too
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Imam-ul-Haq, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length on middle and leg, tucked away to deep square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, clipped to the left of deep square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Asif Ali, 1 run

items.text: short on off stump, pulled to deep square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: length ball on middle stump, clipped towards mid-on, who's on the edge of the circle
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Asif Ali, 1 run

items.preText: Humaid Salman: "Talking of bespectacled cricketers, Charles Coventry and Narendra Hirwani also...." -- Ah, Hirwani. Has anyone else pulled off the combination of spectacles and headband?
items.text: length ball on middle and off, looks like the floater that keeps going with the angle. Watches it well and defends into the covers
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asif Ali, no run

items.text: ooh, that's superb glovework to follow a beauty of a delivery. Classic offspinner's dismissal, lovely flight outside off and it's the one that drifts away slightly and continues along that trajectory after pitching. Draws Asif forward, makes him reach for the ball, and in the process causes him to lift his back foot out of the crease. Liton collects and removes the bails in one motion, and Bangladesh are back on top once more
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asif Ali, OUT

dismissal.text: Asif Ali st †Liton Das b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 31 (47b 3x4 0x6) SR: 65.95

items.preText: Mohammad Nawaz. Two left-handers at the crease. Mehidy goes round the wicket.
items.text: the arm ball first up, slides in and cramps him for room. Defended hurriedly into the covers
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Nawaz, no run

items.text: a bit more flight now, draws him forward, defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Nawaz, no run

items.text: another skiddy arm ball. Stays back and defends into the on side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Nawaz, no run

items.text: fuller now, comes forward to defend into the off side
items.postText: And that is that for me today. It's back to Sreshth for the last 10.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Nawaz, no run

items.text: full outside off stump, and driven with the angled bat to deep extra cover
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: full on leg stump, and he tries to flick this to square leg. But the ball hits his front leg and they scamper off for a single
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run

items.text: uses his feet. Full on off and spinning away. And he drives straight to mid off
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: full on middle and leg, and he uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball. Tapped straight, but straight to mid on
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: Oh dear, he's gone down the wicket! Length ball, but wide outside off stump. Imam's halfway down the track, and the ball is too far away from him. Deceived by the seam-up arm ball, and Liton Das displays some excellent glovework
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Imam-ul-Haq, OUT

dismissal.text: Imam-ul-Haq st †Liton Das b Mahmudullah 83 (105b 2x4 1x6) SR: 79.04

items.preText: Arslan: "Match is finish for pakistan... congratulations Bangladesh for qualify for final...Good night "
items.text: full just outside off stump. Spins inwards, and that's been cut to short third man. Liton tries to do a Dhoni, by attempting a flick the throw onto the stumps, but not everyone is Dhoni
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hasan Ali, 2 runs
